title: Masters
content: I am currently a third year Btech student at PES, how many of you are planning/ gotten an admit(seniors) for masters. What is the situation looking like for yall

comments.body: Quite a few got admits this year and disclosed on the study abroad server, could be many more who haven't disclosed or aren't on it. There are also other alumni who applied and got in this year.
okay thank you , is there any way we could get stats just like we do for placements
Nobody tracks these stats. One way is to check LinkedIn, the other is to join the server and keep an eye on ongoing discussions
Took a gap...will get the coming year. It depends
